name: Killer Maid Service [Prototype]
description:
Job Start! Time to clean up around here. Kill what you can, but don't leave a mess!

Just a simple prototype though. For now, see how high you can get your score.

Controls:

  • W / S - Move up / down a platform
  • A / D - Change Direction
  • E / Mouse 1 - Change Weapon
  • F / Mouse 2 - Toggle between Mob and Weapon

Game premise:

Take on different jobs, use different weapons with various power and fire rates, gain temporary cleaners with different uses.
